channel.title: Tutorial for new people
channel.description:
This will be very short, Ok, 1. O.S means "Operating System" not Skype.
2. If I'm trying to help you and you can't read a tutorial right, you should leave
3. If I'm trying to help you and you can't type English correctly please, just leave this site.
4. I'm a nice person, but when your question is, "I'm new how to I make a server?" and you don't even know what code is, please, leave.
This information was gathered from 1 person, please if you have had experiences to where you felt like sending the person back to kindergarten, please let me know, I need a good laugh.

item.title: Tutorial for new people
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Change Tutorial for new people to “tyyy9’s rules!”.

Ix Soulcist xI:

This is a useless thread and it shouldn’t matter if someone can’t read with a proper understanding or can’t follow a tutorial with a proper understanding, people learn different.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial for new people
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Arrogant, ignorant.

What if someone is from a different country and English is not their native language, or has a learning disability, but wants to program a server?

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial for new people
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

tyyy9:

1. O.S means “Operating System” not Skype.

I had no clue.

tyyy9:

2. If I’m trying to help you and you can’t read a tutorial right, you should leave

Who are you to tell someone to leave? Nobody knows you.

tyyy9:

3. If I’m trying to help you and you can’t type English correctly please, just leave this site.

Sorry, Mr. High-and-mighty, some people aren’t native-tongue to English. Faggot.

[quote=“tyyy9, post:1, topic:413311”]4. I’m a nice person, but when your question is, “I’m new how to I make a server?” and you don’t even know what code is, please, leave.[/quote] again, who are you to tell someone to leave?

Read full topic

This will be very short,
Ok,

  1. O.S means “Operating System” not Skype.

  2. If I’m trying to help you and you can’t read a tutorial right, you should leave

  3. If I’m trying to help you and you can’t type English correctly please, just leave this site.

  4. I’m a nice person, but when your question is, “I’m new how to I make a server?” and you don’t even know what code is, please, leave.

This information was gathered from 1 person, please if you have had experiences to where you felt like sending the person back to kindergarten, please let me know, I need a good laugh.
[/quote]
This is a useless thread and it shouldn’t matter if someone can’t read with a proper understanding or can’t follow a tutorial with a proper understanding, people learn different.[/quote]
thank you, your the actually the nicest person on this forum, when i started and was asking questions, everyone just called me dumbass and didn’t care so I just don’t ask as many questions anymore, thanks for actually caring

Read full topic
